MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK10 postcode area of Alloa, affecting properties in Dunmar Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:10am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:09PM on Wednesday 21 April 2021.
